name: Quick-Charge-Personal-Bots-Continued-Plus
title: Quick Charge Personal Bots
author: NotRexButCaesar
description: This mod allows personal robots to instantly charge for free, as if you had mined them from the air. This could be considered cheating as your personal bots recharge for free, however, mining your bots when they need to charge does the same thing. Originally by djungelorm
